pkgmetadata.longdescription: logging-journald================Pure python logging handler for writing logs to the journald usingnative protocol.```pythonimport loggingfrom logging_journald import JournaldLogHandler, check_journal_stream# Use python default handlerLOG_HANDLERS = Noneif ( # Check if program running as systemd service check_journal_stream() or # Check if journald socket is available JournaldLogHandler.SOCKET_PATH.exists()): LOG_HANDLERS = [JournaldLogHandler()]logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO, handlers=LOG_HANDLERS)logging.info("Hello logging world.")```
